comment:
>>39225720
> [[ Ancient Cathedral: Inner Sanctum – Kjorikos's Study // PVP Disabled ]]

Seems like as good a pick as any.

With Nel leading the group, you file into the room—it's similar to the one you explored previously. Rows of bookshelves form long aisles leading through the place, with a pedestal situated against the far wall: a glass case, that holds a strange-looking device. Against the outer walls, there's multiple laboratory setups larger than the alchemy table at the Writ Keepers' hall. A chandelier hanging high above the middle of the room provides ample light, and you can see large moth-like insects fluttering above.

“This place is ridiculous—oh, he's got a fireplace, too...” Donnel says. “Think there's any Gems in here?”

“There's something. Take a look at that case.” Ayla makes her way to the front of the group, pushing past Nel, who's still diligently mapping. “I think it's more Aetheric tech. There's probably a lot of it around here. It'll put us ahead of the curve, maybe get the message boards online...”

“What was that you said about traps, Dorian?” Kainzo asks.

“Could be cursed.” You fold your arms. “Did I tell you guys I think I'm cursed?”

What will you do?
> Write-in
> Investigate the alchemical setups.
> Investigate the glass case.
name: Sylvetica
